# id

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for the venue.

## Declaration

```swift
let id: UUID
```

## Discussion

Use this identifier to submit `ElectricalLoadEvent`s for [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricityGuidance].

## Identifying the location

- **name**: The name of the Home to which the venue corresponds.
